summary: The clumsy son of a deceased police hero joins the police and his task is to protect a reporter from the most famous gangster of Paris.
cast: Coluche|Gérard Depardieu|Dominique Lavanant|Julien Guiomar|Alain Mottet|François Perrot|Jean Bouchaud|Clément Harari|Philippe Khorsand|Martin Lamotte|Dany Saval|Hubert Deschamps|Marthe Villalonga|Richard Anconina|Féodor Atkine|Richard Bohringer|Jeanne Herviale|Michel Puterflam|Louison Roblin|Christian Spillemaecker|Rémy Azzolini|Gérard Holtz|Nicholas Bang|Gaëtan Bloom|Gérard Cailleux|André Chaumeau|Bouboule|Gérard Couderc|Monique Couturier|Hélène Dublin|Gabriel Gobin|Gérard Guit|Youssef Hamid|Dominique Hulin|Hassen Imatoukène|Franck James|Henri Lambert|Patrick Laurent|Jack Lenoir|Jean-Paul Lilienfeld|Yves Morgan-Jones|Michel Pilorgé|Pierre Plessis|Amélie Prévost|Roger Riffard|Gilbert Robin|Jean-Michel Vaguelsy|Huguette Vergne|Patrick Zard|Michel Berreur|Hippolyte Girardot|Hélène Hermmelin|Maria Laborit|Jean Martin
title: Inspecteur la Bavure
